comment.body:
Cute. But if you wanted to impersonate me you'd have to try a bit harder :P. You're not even on KaffieHub!

And anarchists and capitalists are basically opposites. Just an FYI.
I only ban spammers and CP (but not loli). I've yet to see any of that but if people do please report to me. I'm mostly just hands off on moderation.
My only request is that if someone does fork KopyKate, I ask that they make it a merger site so that we don't run into this problem again.
Do you have a cjdns address node? I'd like to connect over cjdns which uses ipv6. As my network lacks native ipv6 and I'd love to promote cjdns and alternative routing systems.

@→_→: https://github.com/cjdelisle/cjdns

If you're on windows: https://www.santacruzmesh.net/installer.html

You'll need a cjdns peer.
@→_→: I'm not sure how a vpn will help with cjdns, given the two are entirely unrelated. I don't have money to pay for a vpn anyway.
